caption.p: The yjbH gene is responsible for protease and pigment production. (a). Protease production. Two microliters of the overnight cultures of the strains were spotted on TSB+ 3.3% skim milk agar plates and incubated at 37°C overnight. (b). Pigment production. Two microliters of the overnight cultures of the strains were spotted on TSB agar plates and incubated at 37°C overnight
